entry.title: LASHGOD SUPERNATURAL BOND
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHGOD
Type: Adhesive
Price: 67.99

SUPERNATURAL BOND

This adhesive will make history within the lash industry, it is by far the most innovative formula we have ever created. Over a year in the making, this adhesive is revolutionary because it is the first adhesive that is 1/10 fume level, has a .5 second, INSTANT CONTACT dry time and is FREE of Butyl based Cyanoacrylate while still maintaining 8-10 week retention. Butyl Cyanoacrylate is the main bonding ingredient in 99.9% of adhesives but is also the #1 cause of allergies, eye irritation and redness. This adhesive is oil resistant.. yes you heard it oil resistant because is made from carrot seed oil.

Â 

This adhesive dries instantly on contact when it touches the moisture in the natural lash. Our substitute for butyl-based Cyanoacrylate is the extremely mild 2-methoxyethyl acrylate This adhesive has a medium viscosity and is extremely elastic, it moves with the natural lash for high performance lasting retention. Jet black in colour will give your client an instant eyeliner effect when lashes are applied.

Â 

This adhesive has the longest shelf life on the market 10 months unopened and 3+ months opened with correct storage. This adhesive functions in 5% -90% humidity making it an amazing option for lash artists worldwide even in extremely hot countries. This lash adhesive will change lash extensions as we know it. A new era of retention and a new solution for the most sensitive of clients. Finally, clients and lash techs with ongoing adhesive sensitivities may be the solution for you!

Â 

This adhesive requires express shipping to countries over 27 degrees and in the summer months. Store in a cool dry environment when not in use or in a small container of rice. *shake well for one minute before use Our carrot oil formula allows for lashes to be nourished even with lash extensions, SUPERNATURAL bond promotes growth and healthy natural lashes

Â 

SUPERNATURAL BOND FAQ: Dry time: instant (.2-.5 seconds)Viscosity: MediumElasticity: HIGH

Colour: jet black

Humidity 5%-90%

Fume level: 1/10

Shelf life: 10 months unopened

Opened:3.5 monthsSkill level: expert

Oil PROOF Adhesive ingredients: 2-methoxyethyl acrylate, dimethyl silicone polymer with silica( from the acrylate family 2-methoxyethyl acrylate is the mildest form of acrylate, our medical-grade clinically tested formula releases low fumes or irritation causing properties), carrot seed oil extract, black pigment, water.

Free of formaldehyde, latex and odour and high fume ingredients; Butyl. Safe to use with all primers, sealants and retention extenders. Every sensitive client who has experienced past Cyanocrylate allergies is different and should ALWAYS patch test before receiving a full set as Acrylate allergies can be to the only Cyanoacrylate or to all forms of acrylate. Our medical-grade 2-methoxyethyl acrylate formula is extremely sensitive and fast-drying, in combination with supernatural bond certified lash technicians should place lashes a minimum of 1mm from the base of the lash line to avoid irritation on previously reactant clients. Supernatural bond is an excellent choice for non-reactant clients as well as it has low fumes, instant dry time and impeccable retention!

*for certified professionals only*

entry.title: PINK MILK ADHESIVE
entry.summary:
Vendor: LASHGOD
Type: Adhesive
Price: 58.00

PINK MILK ADHESIVE is the very first rose-infused adhesive available on the market, its light pink colour is a conversation piece and a consumer must-have. Not only is it beautiful with low fumes it is hypoallergenic specifically designed for clients with carbon black allergies. Best for normal to mildly sensitive eyes. The main bonding ingredient is medical grade ethyl cyanoacrylate used to close skin level wounds in hospitals. This adhesive is ideal for long-term use, it has a thin viscosity and is very flexible, it moves and bends with the eyelashes and feels virtually weightless. Low fume.

  • Humidity range from 25%-80%.
  • Best temperature storage 14 degrees Celsius to 23 degrees celsius.
  • 1 second dry time!
  • .05 second dry time if used with magnetic ğŸ§² bond retention extender!
  • 6-8 weeks bond time
  • Free of carbon black
  • Free of formaldehyde
  • Free of latex
  • Completely Vegan
  • Made from rose petal extract

Lashgod'sÂ brand new â€œEVERLASTING EMPRESSâ€ completely changes the lash game. This adhesive is specially designed for advanced professionals.

Our instant dry technology instantly polymerizes adhesive on contact and freezes upon contact to the moisture in the natural lash. Say goodbye to dry time and improve the quality of your work, no mess, Stickies, or prolonged isolation. Made from medical grade cyanoacrylate and silicone polymerÂ Â this adhesive is hypoallergenic and has extremely low fumes.

Each drop of adhesive will last you 45min -1hr, extremely slow oxidization time in glue rings, palettes and jade stones! This adhesive is extremely flexible even when dry and comfortable on the natural lash. Our silicone polymer makes our adhesive oil resistant for the longest retention possible. Each bottle will last you 2x as long, lash artists will require significantly less adhesive per application.Â

-instantly binds to the moisture in the natural lash

-oil resistantÂ 

-for advanced professionals onlyÂ

Â 

STORAGE:Â 

-Store in your provided pouch with silica gel to absorb any moistureÂ

-Store between 25% -80% humidityÂ 

-The best storage between 15Â° and 24Â°C

-Store for 5 months unopened, enjoy for 2.5 months open (see pro tips to prolong shelf life)Â 

-Store at room temperature, fridge storage is not recommended!Â 

Â 

PRO TIPS:Â 

â€¢Adhesive chemicals become dormant and separate inside of the bottle and they are not being used, make sure to always shake adhesive for one minute before using, after dispensing your drop of adhesive turn the bottle back upright squeeze all excess oxygen out of the bottle onto a nozzle wipe, continue to squeeze, wipe the nozzle clean and apply the cap while still squeezing the bottle to ensure no oxygen is on your adhesive!Â 

â€¢PAIR with LASHGOD magnetic bond retention extender for the quickest finish and seamless Russian volume application

â€¢Using withÂ glue rings and adhesive palettesÂ 

â€¢ enjoy servicing approximately 50 clients per bottleÂ 

Â 

INGREDIENTS: 2-cyanoacrylate, 2-methoxyethyl, dimethyl silicone PolymerÂ 

SIZE: 5mlÂ

entry.title: Ruthie Belle - Dark Matter
entry.summary:
Vendor: RUTHIE BELLE
Type: Adhesive
Price: 120.00

Dark Matter is a fast-setting and oil-resistant lash glue that results in better retention.

-Â Works with virtually any humidity and temperature
-Â Bonds in half a second to one second
- Minimal fumes
-Â 100% oil proof
-Â One glue dot lasts for up to 5 hours
-Â Stays fresh for 3 months after opening
-Â Allows you to work faster
-Â Suitable for intermediate and advanced lash stylists
-Â Works with all types of lashes and techniques
-Â Contains castor oil
-Â Does NOT contain carbon black

HOW IT WORKS?

The purity of the cyanoacrylate used in Dark Matter allows it to work with any humidity and any temperature. Generally, the higher the humidity the longer the glue drop will stay fresh, but tests show Dark Matter works perfectly in humidities varying from 10% to 95%, and the glue is optimized in temperatures that range from 16Â°C to 39Â°C (61Â°F to 102Â°F).

While Dark Matter sets very fast, it does not dry out on your lash plate or lose its adhesive capability. One glue dot can be worked with for 1.5â€“5 hours. This means one bottle of Dark Matter will last from 3 to 10 times more than other adhesives and you will work much more efficiently as you do not need to refresh your glue dot every 30 minutes.

Dark Matter is sensitive to alcohol, so AVOIDÂ all high alcohol content products as they affect retention in a negative way (includes hand sanitizers and regular primers/glue accelerators).

HOW TO USE IT?

-Â Shake well for 1 minute before first use
-Â Apply a drop of Dark Matter on silicone or foil (DO NOTÂ use on plastic, paper, tape or jade stone as these react to the adhesive)
-Â Allow to air for 5 minutes
-Â Work from the middle of your glue drop, using a scooping technique to pick up a bubble of adhesive and apply it on the root of the extensions
-Â No need to replace glue dots even when they begin to dry out from the outer edge. Get a fresh dot only when the texture becomes stringy
-Â If you use pinching method/finger roll to create volume fans, do not use hand sanitizers with high alcohol content (opt for alcohol-free hand sanitizer) and do not use regular primers/glue accelerators as their main active ingredient is alcohol. Use ONLY Ruthie Belleâ€™s Adhesive Superdry as a primer/adhesive accelerator (Superdry works with all other adhesives too).

For more information, watch Ruthie Belleâ€™s â€œHow to use Dark Matterâ€ videoÂ here.

NB! Dark Matter is not compatible with Prolong lash cleanser.

HOW TO STORE IT?

-Â Shake well for 10 seconds once a day after opened
-Â Keep container tightly closed when not in use
-Â Store away from direct sunlight or heat
-Â Keep in a cool place, preferably under 25Â°C (77Â°F). Unopened bottles may be kept on the middle shelf of the refrigerator. In these cases, take out 30 minutes before first use and shake well for 2 minutes. Never keep an opened bottle of Dark Matter in the fridge to avoid condensed water from developing and starting the glueâ€™s curing process within the bottle.
-Â If stored correctly, Dark Matter stays fresh for 6 months unopened and for up to 3 months after opening

OTHER INFORMATION

Dark Matter is produced only twice a month so that customers always receive fresh glue. You can check the manufacturing date (d/m/y) within the â€œCh:â€¦â€ code found on the bottom of the bottle.

Dark Matter is black, but does not contain carbon black. It is produced in the EU with the same high â€œmedical gradeâ€ cyanoacrylate used in wound adhesives. Please note that Dark Matter should be used only by experienced lash artists.

INCI:Â 2-Methoxyethyl 2-Cyanoacrylate, Dimethyl Silicone Polymer with Silica, Acrylates, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil, CI 77499
